data.event: Smithfield, first colonized in 1634, is located on the Pagan River, not far from Jamestown.

Warrosquyoake Shire (with numerous variant spellings, including Warrascoyack, Warrascocke and "Warwick Squeak") was officially formed in 1634 in the Virginia colony, but had already been known as "Warascoyack County" before this.

event.title: was renamed Isle of Wight County in 1637

data.event: It was renamed Isle of Wight County in 1637.
